title: 3.) Top 40 Countdown - How Do I Handle My Lying Mom?
description:
Miriam is not happy with her mother who has a pattern of fudging the truth when she wants something from Miriam. - Dr. Laura: "She will show more respect you when you demand more respect."

Are you comfortable speaking your mind with your parents? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
